fields.summary: Add JDK 24 to Ubuntu 20.04 docker development images
fields.description:
The first step to supporting JDK23/24 is being able to test it.

Add JDK24 to the default docker images, so that both manual and automated testing is possible.

comments.body:
stoty opened a new pull request, #7495:
URL: https://github.com/apache/hadoop/pull/7495

   ### Description of PR
   
   Adds JDK23 to Ubuntu 20.04 development docker images.
   Also sets the default JDK to 1.8 to be consistent with the existing JAVA_HOME setting
   
   This patch does not change the JDK used by default (apart from setting up java/javac alternatives to be consistent with JAVA_HOME), but adds the possibility to easily switch to JDK23 for testing.
   
   ### How was this patch tested?
   
   Ran start-build-env.sh on x86_64 and ARM hosts, and checked that JDK23 is present and working.
   Also checked that the java and javac command on the PATH and JAVA_HOME point to the same 1.8 JDK.
   
   ### For code changes:
   
   - [X ] Does the title or this PR starts with the corresponding JIRA issue id (e.g. 'HADOOP-17799. Your PR title ...')?
   - [ ] Object storage: have the integration tests been executed and the endpoint declared according to the connector-specific documentation?
   - [ ] If adding new dependencies to the code, are these dependencies licensed in a way that is compatible for inclusion under [ASF 2.0](http://www.apache.org/legal/resolved.html#category-a)?
   - [ ] If applicable, have you updated the `LICENSE`, `LICENSE-binary`, `NOTICE-binary` files?

pan3793 commented on PR #7495:
URL: https://github.com/apache/hadoop/pull/7495#issuecomment-2718028333

   Given JDK 24 is [scheduled](https://openjdk.org/projects/jdk/24/) to reach GA on 2025/03/18, use JDK 24 directly?

stoty commented on PR #7495:
URL: https://github.com/apache/hadoop/pull/7495#issuecomment-2718097634

   We can easily update to JDK24, once it is released, but we can also wait a week, @pan3793 .

stoty commented on PR #7495:
URL: https://github.com/apache/hadoop/pull/7495#issuecomment-2736682583

   Looks like the official temurin Java 24 release is still about two weeks out.

stoty commented on PR #7495:
URL: https://github.com/apache/hadoop/pull/7495#issuecomment-2742289026

   I was too pessimistic, temurin JDK 24 is out now.
   I'm gonna test if my jdk23 works with jdk24, and report back, @cnauroth .

stoty commented on PR #7495:
URL: https://github.com/apache/hadoop/pull/7495#issuecomment-2742846620

   Thank you, @pan3793 .
   
   I've seen mysterious test failures that were fixed by replacing coretto (never tracked down the root cause), so I prefer to wait for temurin, which I believe is the the de-facto default Java distribution.

stoty commented on PR #7495:
URL: https://github.com/apache/hadoop/pull/7495#issuecomment-2751767469

   The Ubuntu Temurin Java 24 package has been released, and I've updated the PR for JDK24, @pan3793 @cnauroth .

cnauroth commented on PR #7495:
URL: https://github.com/apache/hadoop/pull/7495#issuecomment-2752024876

   I committed this to trunk. @stoty , thank you for the patch. @pan3793 , thank you for reviewing.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved
